name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. David JOHNSON, Appellant
docket_number: Appeal No. 11 Eastern District Appeal Docket 1999

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J, and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. David JOHNSON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 20 * day of December, 1999 the appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Justice NIGRO dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Gerald A. Stein, Philip J. Degnan, Philadelphia, for David Johnson
Catherine Marshall, Hugh J. Burns, Jr., Philadelphia, for Com.

741 A.2d 1272

Decided Dec. 20, 1999.
Gerald A. Stein, Philip J. Degnan, Philadelphia, for David Johnson

Before FLAHERTY, C.J, and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
